title: nf-core/metaval pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

run_accession.errorMessage: Run accession must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for short reads 1, long reads or merged pair-end reads must be provided from bowtie2 or minimap2 unmapped reads against the human genome, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'.

fastq_2.errorMessage: The FastQ file for short reads 2 resulting from Bowtie2's unmapped read 2 against the human genome, cannot contain spaces and must have the extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'.

kraken2_report.errorMessage: Kraken2 classification report must be provided.

kraken2_result.errorMessage: Kraken2 classification results must be provided.

centrifuge_report.errorMessage: Centrifuge kreport file must be provided.

centrifuge_result.errorMessage: Centrifuge result file must be provided and it should contain eight columns: readID, seqID, taxID, score, 2ndBestScore, hitLength, queryLength, numMatches.

diamond.errorMessage: Diamond classification results should be provided.
